price: Nkͻmhyεfoͻ dodoͻ sεn na Yεsomaa wͻn baa tetefoͻ no hͻ?
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
